content: this unique granny square has loads of texture and lots of color this is the first pattern in the you ve got options crochet along 1 with 12 free patterns for for granny squares with 6 and 12 variations > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing changing colors crocheting in the back loop includes link to video tutorial crocheting in chain spaces includes video tutorial special stitches bob puff with written instructions and video tutorials in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** 6 square **materials** lion brand vanna s choice 3 yarn 100% acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g 170 yd/156 m 1 skein each in 180e cranberry ca 101a pink cb and 100 white cc *or approximately 15 yd 14 m in ca and 25 yd 23 m each in cb and cc in any medium weight yarn* us size i-9/5 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* locking stitch marker or scrap yarn optional yarn needle **gauge** through round 3 = 4 10 cm square in pattern *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2026/01/05/2026-youve-got-options-cal/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2026/01/05/athena-unique-granny-squares-patterns/ 3 https //lionbrand sjv io/xmzayg
